hero.gae1:
Ór atá uait is dócha? 
Féach síos 
Má shínann tú lámh isteach...
hero.eng1:
You want gold probably? 
Look down 
If you stretch a hand in...
hero.gae2:
...you won't?
 But see how it shines!
hero.eng2:
...ní shínfaidh?
 Ach féach an lionra atá ar!
hero.eng3:
Not gold?
knowledge is what you seek then
hero.gae3:
Ní ór?
feasa atá á lorg agat mar sin
hero.eng4:
You'll find torches 
at the back of the cave
hero.gae4:
Aimseoidh tú tóirsí 
ag cúl an plúais
